subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ilya Kovalchuk scored two goals, and Martin Brodeur made 29 saves as the Devils ended a five-game losing streak with a 3-0 victory over the Phoenix Coyotes.
snippet: Ilya Kovalchuk scored two goals, and Martin Brodeur made 29 saves as the Devils ended a five-game losing streak with a 3-0 victory over the Phoenix Coyotes.
